messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] New and interested.
messages.msgSnippet: cipher, i too have somewhat of a sword collection, my most recent purchase is a zionochi by Paul Chen. its a gorgeous sword but takes a lot of care. so if you
messages.messageBody:
cipher, i too have somewhat of a sword collection, my most recent purchase is a zionochi by Paul Chen. its a gorgeous sword but takes a lot of care. so if you or anyone else has questions on sword care you can probably ask me.





Tom Hatfield

"In all forms of stratagy, it is necessary to maintain the combat stance in everyday life, and to make your everyday stance your combat stance."

-Miyamoto Musashi, The Book of Five Rings,

The Water Book

oneundeadlord@...

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] New and interested.
messages.msgSnippet: On Tue, 22 Jun 2004 18:32:09 -0000, cipher09born$B$5$s(B wrote in message  Hi Cipher! Welcome to the group. I hope you enjoy your
messages.messageBody:
On Tue, 22 Jun 2004 18:32:09 -0000, cipher09bornさん wrote in message <cb9tv9+vkp5@...>

Hi Cipher! Welcome to the group. I hope you enjoy your time here.

>Few years ago I started a hobby by collecting swords,I haven't got
>many swords mostly Chinese and Japanese swords.My most favorite was
>the japanese katana and ever since I'm interested in Japanese
>Samuar�history,so here I am,this is all very new to me,but I want
>to learn everything there is to know.

Leaning it all is a big task. :) I suggest starting slow. Ask a few
specific questions about whatever it is you're most interested in. I'm
sure you'll get a lot of information from the good folks here.

--
Jay Kelly
oyakata@...

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] New and interested.
messages.msgSnippet: Hey Welcome aboard .This is the place to be. There is a lot of knowledge being passed on by good people. The Sword is what made me interested in the Samurai as
messages.messageBody:
Hey Welcome aboard .This is the place to be. There is a lot of knowledge being passed on by good people. The Sword is what made me interested in the Samurai as well. As well as many other topics like history, battles, and the people.

Takara
Daimyo of the Samurai Society
http://hstrial-derickson.homestead.com/samurai.html

cipher09born <cipher09born@...> wrote:
Hi,

the japanese katana and ever since I'm interested in Japanese

messages.subject: New and interested.
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I m new to this group,so here s a message to introduce me. I m Cipher Born,male and from Belgium. Few years ago I started a hobby by collecting swords,I
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

I'm new to this group,so here's a message to introduce me.
I'm Cipher Born,male and from Belgium.

Few years ago I started a hobby by collecting swords,I haven't got
many swords mostly Chinese and Japanese swords.My most favorite was
the japanese katana and ever since I'm interested in Japanese
Samuarï history,so here I am,this is all very new to me,but I want
to learn everything there is to know.
